text:
Breakfast

Blue Collar: 3 eggs, choice of 3 bacon, sausage, bologna, choice of 3 pancakes or 3 french toast, homefries: $15.50
East Ender: 2 eggs, choice of 2 pancakes or french toast, choice of 2 bacon, 2 sausage, or 2 bologna, homefries: $13.50
Scrambler: 2 eggs, bacon, ham, sausage, mushrooms, peppers, onion, cheese, homefries: $16.50
Omelette: egg & cheese (add bacon, ham, sausage, mushrooms, peppers, onion $1 each): $12.00

1 egg: $1.50

name: Little Pie Shop and Diner, The
